items.name: slot
items.title: Slot
items.description: A polymorphic component that merges props with child element

items.name: breadcrumb
items.title: Breadcrumb
items.description: Displays the path to the current resource using a hierarchy of links

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: A button component with variants and sizes

items.name: collapsible
items.title: Collapsible
items.description: An interactive component which expands/collapses a panel

items.name: pagination
items.title: Pagination
items.description: Pagination with page navigation, next and previous links

items.name: popover
items.title: Popover
items.description: A floating panel that appears relative to a trigger element

items.name: textarea
items.title: Textarea
items.description: A multi-line text input field with error state support

items.name: separator
items.title: Separator
items.description: A visual divider that separates content horizontally or vertically

items.name: sheet
items.title: Sheet
items.description: A panel that slides in from the edge of the screen

items.name: toggle-group
items.title: Toggle Group
items.description: A set of two-state buttons that can be toggled on or off

items.name: tooltip
items.title: Tooltip
items.description: A popup that displays contextual information on hover or focus
